name: Analytics Reporting UI
description: An Ember engine for in-app analytics reporting at Salsify. Provides dashboards and reporting interfaces including Buy Box analytics. Integrates with Dandelion for data and uses ember-cli-mirage for mock APIs during development. Runs on port 6404 locally and features continuous deployment for production.

name: UI User Tracking
description: An Ember addon library for tracking user interaction events across Salsify UI applications. Used by analytics-reporting-ui and other front-end micro apps to capture user activity data.

name: UI Error Reporting
description: An Ember addon library for capturing and reporting unhandled errors in Salsify UI applications. Integrates with BugSnag for error tracking and monitoring across front-end micro apps.
